label: Data Sources Disclosed
description: Indicates that the data sources for this visualization are known and listed.

label: Open Data
description: Indicates that this visualization shows open data, i.e., that is publicly accessible, allowing viewers to download, verify, or reuse it.

label: Dataset Linked
description: Indicates that a link to the dataset is provided with the visualization

label: Data Citation
description: References a published document that describes or validates the dataset

label: Raw Data Available
description: Indicates that raw or unprocessed material is accessible, such as images, scans, text, etc.

label: Trusted Data Source
description: Indicates that the data is obtained from a source considered reliable or reputable by the author.

label: Dynamic Data
description: Indicates the information is refreshed periodically or continuously, so the chart may change over time

label: Data Up-To-Date
description: Indicates that the dataset reflects the latest data available

label: Analysis Constraints
description: Indicates limitations in the data analysis process

label: Missing Data
description: Indicates some parts of the data is missing

label: Contains Modeled Data
description: Indicates that a portion or all of the dataset is derived from algorithmic modeling

label: Contains Predictions
description: Indicates that the entire or parts of the data are future prediction implying (unqualified) uncertainty

label: May Contain Bias
description: Indicates potential systematic distortion from data collection, sampling, or modeling processes.

label: May Contain Noise
description: Indicates random variation or measurement errors in the data.

label: Heterogenous Data
description: Indicates that the visualization combines data from very heterogenous sources, e.g., text, images, sensors, etc.

label: Human Survey Data
description: Indicates that the data comes directly from individuals’ own statements or surveys.

label: Derived Data
description: Indicates that data was ceated by processing and combining existing raw data sets

label: Manually Collected Data
description: Indicates that humans actively gathered or annotated the data (e.g., observations, surveys, qualitative coding)

label: Sensor Data
description: Indicates that data is captured using physical instruments or devices (e.g., sensors, lab equipment).

label: API-Based Collection
description: Indicates that the data was retrieved through an Application Programming Interface (API), such as online social media or online open-data APIs.

label: Collection Period Specified
description: Indicates that the time period of data collection is known.

label: Data Creator(s) Attributed
description: Identifies the individual or team who collected the dataset

label: Adapted Elsewhere
description: Indicates that the same data or visualization was reused by third parties. This can be a sign of endorsement and validity of the data or visulization.

label: Multiple Data Sources
description: Indicates that the visualization combines datasets from multiple origins, likely involving aggreagtion

label: Single Data Source
description: Indicates that the visualization shows data originating only from a single data source.

label: Missing Values Handled
description: Indicates that missing data had been treated by some method, e.g., by imputation, deletion, or a any other custom method.

label: Outliers Removed
description: Indicates that extreme values have been excluded or adjusted, which may affect distributions, variance, and other statistics.

label: Binning Applied
description: Indicates that continuous values were grouped into categories

label: Data Normalized
description: Indicates that values have been scaled or standardized (e.g., min–max, z-score) to align ranges or distributions.

label: Tokenization Applied
description: Indicates that text has been split into discrete tokens (words or subwords) for analysis

label: Part-of-Speech Tagging Applied
description: Indicates that each token was labeled with its grammatical function (noun, verb, etc.).

label: Features Extracted
description: Indicates that additional variables or representations (e.g., SIFT, word embeddings) were created from raw data.

label: Stemming Applied
description: Indicates that words were reduced to base forms, removing morphological variations

label: Stopwords Removed
description: Indicates that common filler words were removed to emphasize meaningful terms

label: Analysis Tools Attributed
description: Indicates that data analysis was performed using an acknowledged and available tool.

label: Automatically Labeled Data
description: Indicates part of the entire data set comes from automatic labelling

label: Random Sampling
description: Indicates that data points were selected on  a purely random or probabilistic method

label: Stratified Sampling
description: Indicates that subgroups (strata) pre-identified, and samples drawn proportionally from each subgroup

label: Systematic Sampling
description: Indicates that the datapoints were chosen at a regular interval

label: Cluster Sampling
description: Indicates that a subgroup/cluster is used as the sampling unit

label: Alternative Units as Reference
description: Provides a reference to better comprehend used scales/units in the visualization

label: Complex units
description: Indicates that this visualization contains units likely unfamilar to the intended audience requiring explanation of reference points

label: 95% CI Error Bars
description: Indicates that the chart displays 95% confidence intervals. Values outside these bars are still possible but less likely.

label: Actual time offset
description: Indicates that latest time stamp used in a chart is behind the actual time,

label: Time range selected
description: Indicates that data is filtered to a chosen timeframe, so earlier or later periods may be omitted

label: Data filtered
description: Indicates that data was included or excluded based on certain conditions or status indicators

label: Geographically filtered
description: Indicates that the dataset is filtered by location-based rules

label: Demographic filter
description: Indicates that data was included or excluded based on demographic attributes (e.g., age, gender, income, etc.)

label: Data manually removed
description: Indicates that certain data points were intentionally removed for specific reasons

label: Can sort & filter
description: Indicates that viewers can reorder or filter data for a customized view

label: Aggregated data
description: Indicates that values have been combined or averaged, which may hide detailed variations

label: Simpson's Paradox
description: Indicates that combined data may conceal or reverse trends visible in separate subgroups. This is know at Simpson's paradox

label: Correlation ≠ Causation
description: Reminds the reader of a visualization that a correlation in the visualization may not or knowingly is not a cause.

label: Major Finding
description: Indicates that a this visulization shows a central result

label: Adjusted baseline
description: Indicates that a non-zero or shifted reference point is used (e.g., per capita, moving averages).

label: Possible visual artifacts
description: Indicates that the visualization algorithm or scaling method may produce patterns not present in the underlying data

label: Rounding errors
description: Indicates that data in the visualization may contain rounding errors, e.g., values not adding up to 100%.

label: Mind false conclusions
description: Warns the reader that a seemingly obvious visual pattern may lead to false conclusions

label: Shows top N
description: Indicates that the visualization only shows the top N elements of some selection and based on some criterion.

label: For general audience
description: Indicates that this visualization was designed to be easily understood by a general audience without domain-expertise, i.e., that it migth make some simplifications or ommits some complexity

label: For experts only
description: Indicates that the chart is created for those with specialized or technical knowledge in that domain

label: For policy makers
description: Indicates that the chart is primarily aimed at government officials or decision-makers, the visualization contains very condensed, high-level information.

label: Public domain visualization
description: Indicates that the chart is free from copyright restrictions

label: <X> License
description: Indicates a specific license under which the chart is distributed

label: Public domain data
description: Indicates that the dataset is free from copyright or usage restrictions

label: Data: CC0 Dedication
description: Indicates that the data is under the Creative Commons Public Domain Dedication (CC0)

label: Data: ODC-PDDL
description: Indicates that the dataset is licensed under the Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License

label: Attributed Visualization Creators
description: Indicates that the individual or organization responsible for the visualizatio creation

label: Sensitive topic
description: Indicates that the charts is about a sensitive topic and who's findings may offset readers.

label: Technical terminology
description: Indicates that the visulization uses domain-specific technical terms unfamiliar to many people.

label: Terminology explained
description: Indicates that definitions or clarifications of special terms are provided.

label: Background reading available
description: Indicates that extra materials or readings are provided for further context.

label: Can mouseover
description: Indicates that users see additional details upon hovering over elements

label: Zoomable
description: Indicates that the map is zoomable

label: Can sort
description: Indicates that users can reorder elements along a particular dimension.

label: Paramterizable
description: Indicates that users can modify parameters or settings of the visualization.

label: Brushing & linking
description: Indicates that users can brush and highlight elements within or across a set of visualizations

label: Details-on-demand
description: Indicates that details-on-demand are available for hovered or selected elements

label: Interactive pre-filter
description: Indicates that the visualized data is pre-filtered but can be manually adjusted

label: Device-responsive
description: Indicates that the chart automatically adapts to various screen sizes and aspect ratios.

label: Non-area-preserving projection
description: Indicates that the chosen map projection does not keep area proportions consistent

label: Points don't match exact locations
description: Indicates that symbol positions on the map may not reflect precise coordinates

label: Points match exact locations
description: Indicated that symbol positions have exact coordinates for the event.

label: Uncertainty visualized
description: Indicates that statistical or model uncertainty is displayed (e.g., error bars, confidence bands)

label: Uncertainty omitted
description: Indicates that uncertainty in the data is potentially known but not visualized.

label: Dual-axis encoding
description: Indicates that two different (vertical) axes are used to represent separate variables in the same chart.

label: Truncated axis
description: Indicates that an axis starts from a non-zero point, explaining the rationale for that

label: Inconsistent axis intervals
description: Indicates that intervals on the axis are not uniform, potentially confusing scale perception.

label: Inverted axis
description: Indicates that an axis direction is reversed with respect to an otherwise intuitive direction, e.g., higher values on the top, time passing from left to right, etc.

label: Differing Y-axis
description: Indicates that multiple charts use differing y-axis scales or baselines

label: Log scale
description: Indicates that a logarithmic scale is used to represent data

label: Size distortion
description: Indicates that graphical elements’ sizes may not be strictly proportional to their data values

label: Small values exaggerated
description: Indicates that tiny data points are magnified for visibility

label: Invisible small values
description: Indicates that extremely small items may not be visible at the current scale, e.g., they cannot be seen at the current screen resolution or zoom level.

label: Overlapping elements
description: Indicates that visual elements may overlap in dense areas

label: Colorblind-safe
description: Indicates that colors were chosen to remain distinguishable for colorblind viewers

label: Printer-safe
description: Indicates that the design remains clear and readable when printed

label: Area encoding
description: Indicates that the size of visual elements is calculated as function of their value mapped to the area.

label: False friend
description: Indicates that a visualization may resemble a common visualization yet might require different interpretation

label: Null-values removed
description: Indicates that data points with null or infinite values have been excluded.

label: Varying scales
description: Indicates that multiple adjacent charts use different axis scales, complicating comparison across charts.

label: Rainbow required
description: Indicates that a rainbow-like color gradient is required to show the specific data.

label: Redundant encodings
description: Indicates that multiple visual channels (e.g., color + shape) convey the same attribute

label: Labels ommitted
description: Indicates that axis text is provided in accompanying descriptions rather than on the axis itself

label: Composite index
description: Indicates that a combined metric synthesized from multiple factors is displayed

label: Qualitative categories
description: Indicates that data is presented in categorical groupings (e.g., high, medium, low)

label: Approximate times
description: Indicates that the timeframe shown is approximate

label: Estimated geographic boundaries
description: Indicates that geographic shapes or borders are inferred and not exact

label: Uneven time intervals
description: Indicates that the spacing between time points is inconsistent

label: Known data gap
description: Indicates that a recognized period or portion of missing records exists

label: 3D
description: Indicates that the chart visualizes three-dimensional or volume-based measurements. The chart may contain occlusion.

label: Experts involved
description: Indicates that domain experts provided insights or guided the design and analysis

label: AI-generate visualization
description: Indicates that the chart was produced using generative AI tools (e.g., GPT, DALL-E)

label: AI-generated data
description: Indicates that part or all of the dataset was created by an AI model

label: AI-assisted analysis
description: Indicates that AI methods (e.g., clustering, pattern recognition) assisted in data analysis.

label: AI-generated captions
description: Indicates that descriptive text or annotations were produced by an AI system

label: AI-derived insight
description: Indicates that key insights or interpretations rely on AI-based evaluations

label: Human-verified AI
description: Indicates that humans verified results generated by an AI

label: Possible AI bias
description: Indicates that the visualization may reflect distortions introduced by AI systems

label: No AI involved
description: Confirms that no AI was used during the creation of this visualization

label: Secondary data
description: Indicates that the dataset is itself derived from secondary or aggregated sources, rather than the original raw data

label: Data off the map
description: Indicates that there are elements not shown in the current view.

label: Semi-auto data processing
description: Indicate the data processing involves manual cleaning in addition to machine processing

label: Additional manual cleaning
description: Indicate the data processing is cross checked with manual cleaning

label: Irregular patterns
description: Indicate there are irregular patterns that do not lead to contextual findings.

label: Interval breaks
description: Indicates that an axis in the visualization has one or more breaks, i.e., unequal intervals

label: Positionless elements now shown
description: Indicates that this visualization does not or cannot show elements without a geographic position.

label: Simplified geographic boundaries
description: Indicates that geographic boundaries have been simplified to improve readability of this visualization.
